description: We started serving our gourmet sorbet in July of 2015. We serve sorbet made from fresh fruit and herbs, no preservatives or artificial ingredients. The sorbet Truck is featured at the Johns Island Farmers Market every Saturday and we're at Folly Beach every Sunday. Some of our most sought after flavors are the Raspberry Lime Jalapeño, the Strawberry Basil, the Piña Colada, and the Beet Pistachio. We have an endless variety and special offerings for holiday or party fare. We also serve grilled cheese with a variety of cheeses and sliced vegetables.
name: The Sorbet Truck
